TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a game title and describe the new game in a single line

Articles.Content:
FLEX: A game about flexing your muscles!

(Original game: RFLEX)

"Minesweepe..."

A simulator of unlucky minesweeper.

Left 4 dad

A visual novel game about a girl that must live alone with her ill father

crazy tax

a new an interesting spreadsheet simulator.

Starfight: Compete in the Interstel fighting ring and ignore the solar flares going on nearby! Comes with a twist ending where George Bicep is actually a Minstrel!

Maser of Orion: Watch as Orion uses a maser to destroy all life in the galaxy.

Also... Heres one where i change a letter instead.

Master of Onion: GET ALL THE ONIONS. This game makes you cry and sweat alot.
Ioshock. They have found it near Jupiter, and the world will never be the same.
Biosock: The world falls into chaos as the most lethal dirty sock threatens to kill everyone.

World Of Tans: Crowd the beaches in this massive multiplayer online sunbathing simulator.

Urban Chas - Riot Response: The sequel to Rural Chas - Total Apathy, this time Chas gets things going

"Remove one letter from a game title and describe the new game in single line"

It's a forum game about removing one letter from a game title and describing the new game in a single line.
(Indefinite article "a" is omitted intentionally, due to the game rules).
Dungeon Keper: a weaving simulator, in which you produce various types of fabrics for evil minions!

Star Wars: Republic Command.

Play as Chancellor Palpatine during the third movie, trying to keep both sides in check and protecting your secret identity.

Half-Lie

RPG. Reveal the truth, but not totally.

Birds Of Pay: (PG18) Get paid.

Flying Sauce: Food fight at Area 51!

Future Was: Go full speed on a head on collision course with time itself.

Platon: As a soldier, you decide it's time to think things through.

Martin Memorandum: Tex Murphy is taking on his hardest case to date: Who is Martin and who gave him that last name?

Mortalko mBat.
Adventures of the East-European Batman.

kerbal pace program:

a TV show that features Jeb running at a specific pace
Attletail, game where you attempt to escape rocks that have been drained of their ore and have come to life.

(I think this is a game)

reck happily ever after

where you reck things to keep your character happy

Edited May 15, 2017 by kerbinorbiter

Backwake (Blackwake).

A game where you have to wake up your back.

Race the sig

a game where you race a signature 

(actual game: Race the stig)
Removed the first letter from "checkers". A rude game.
Earthbond: play as aard James bond against Soviet farmers and Golden Comb-eye-n

chest a game where you try to beat the opponent in a classic game of chest (subsittute the chess king for a chest)

Edited May 17, 2017 by kerbinorbiter

Cars Against Humanity

Is a showdown of people vs a regular cars

Tomb Aider.

Cemetery staff simulator.

Farting Simulator 2017

Get away with it in increasingly difficult situations

SM

Edited May 18, 2017 by Speeding Mullet
